Extract intensity column in wide format

Source: R/tidyMS_aggregation.R
extractIntensities.Rd

Extract intensity column in wide format

extractIntensities(pdata, config)

Examples

library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:Biobase’:
#> 
#>     combine
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:BiocGenerics’:
#> 
#>     combine, intersect, setdiff, union
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

bb <- prolfqua_data('data_ionstar')$filtered()
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(bb$data) == 25780)
configur <- bb$config
data <- bb$data

xnested <- data |>
 dplyr::group_by_at( configur$table$hkeysDepth() ) |>
 tidyr::nest()
x <- xnested$data[[1]]
nn  <- x |> dplyr::select( setdiff(configur$table$hierarchyKeys() ,  configur$table$hkeysDepth()) ) |>
 dplyr::distinct() |> nrow()

xx <- extractIntensities(x,configur)
stopifnot(dim(xx)==c(nn,20))

# change hierarchyDepth ###################
conf <- configur$clone(deep=TRUE)
conf$table$hierarchyDepth = 1

xnested <- data |>
 dplyr::group_by_at(conf$table$hkeysDepth()) |>
 tidyr::nest()
head(xnested)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 2
#> # Groups:   protein_Id [6]
#>   protein_Id                        data              
#>   <chr>                             <list>            
#> 1 sp|P21589|5NTD_HUMAN~1527~P21589  <tibble [320 × 9]>
#> 2 sp|Q9NZM3|ITSN2_HUMAN~4539~Q9NZM3 <tibble [40 × 9]> 
#> 3 sp|O43660|PLRG1_HUMAN~356~O43660  <tibble [140 × 9]>
#> 4 sp|P0AG78|SUBI_ECOLI~1278~P0AG78  <tibble [40 × 9]> 
#> 5 sp|P0A908|MIPA_ECOLI~1035~P0A908  <tibble [40 × 9]> 
#> 6 sp|Q6UX04|CWC27_HUMAN~3241~Q6UX04 <tibble [40 × 9]> 

x <- xnested$data[[1]]
nn  <- x |> dplyr::select( setdiff(configur$table$hierarchyKeys(),  configur$table$hkeysDepth()) ) |>
 dplyr::distinct() |> nrow()

xx <- extractIntensities(x,conf)
stopifnot(dim(xx)==c(nn,20))
